'''Items''' found throughout {{poe2}} fall into numerous categories, with one basic purpose: Advancing the story, enhancing your performance in combat, or otherwise making your characters more powerful. 
*Item categories are listed per slot. 
*Items can be [crafted](/craftingDeadfire/).
*Bonuses from equipment and spells that influence the same stat ([attribute](/attribute/)s, [skill](/skill/)s, [Interrupt value](/interrupt/), etc.) do not stack with each other. E.g. if you have a +2 bonus to [Might](/might/) and a +3 bonus to might only the +3 bonus will be applied.<ref name="stackedbuffs">[http://forums.somethingawful.com/showthread.php?threadid=3593502&userid=17931&perpage=40&pagenumber=3#post425015556 Forum post by Josh Sawyer]</ref>
